DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate safety immunogenicity Fluzone® Quadrivalent vaccine participant age 6 month < 9 year enrollment , divide 2 age stratum ( 6 month < 36 month 3 year < 9 year ) Primary Objective : - To describe safety 2013-2014 formulation Fluzone Quadrivalent vaccine , administer 1- 2-dose schedule , accordance Advisory Committee Immunization Practices ( ACIP ) recommendation , child 6 month < 9 year age . Observational Objectives : - To describe immunogenicity 2013-2014 formulation Fluzone Quadrivalent vaccine , administer 1- 2-dose schedule accordance ACIP recommendation , child 6 month < 9 year age . - To submit sera subject Center Biologics Evaluation Research ( CBER ) analysis World Health Organization ( WHO ) , Centers Disease Control Prevention ( CDC ) , Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) support formulation recommendation subsequent influenza vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Among Healthy Children Receiving Fluzone® Quadrivalent Influenza Virus Vaccine
DOC.detailed_description: Participants assign appropriate age group ( 6 month < 36 month age 3 year < 9 year age ) base subject 's age time enrollment . Solicited adverse event ( AE ) information collect 7 day vaccination , unsolicited AE information collect Visit 1 Visit 2 , Visit 3 subject receive 2 dos . Serious adverse event information collect Visit 1 Visit 2 , Visit 3 subject receive 2 dos . Immunogenicity evaluate subject prior vaccination Day 0 ( Visit 1 ) Day 28 final vaccination use hemagglutination inhibition technique . For influenza vaccine strain , pre- post-vaccination geometric mean titer calculate .
